topic.title: How can I create a new community and add it to the topbar?
topic.body: Hello, how can I add a new ZeroTalk Community to the Top bar? (Arabic Community)

1569091295_1HEFBARrwQ11fqordfVWknwZSngrq.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1077_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You should ask nofish -- he's the owner of this ZeroTalk, so only he can update the top bar. /spawn @nofish

Thank you :-)
